synopsis.text: For Takafumi, life takes an unexpected turn when his uncle, after spending 17 years in a coma, miraculously awakens. Now, Takafumi is tasked with helping his uncle navigate the complexities of the modern world, which includes everything from smartphones to the latest anime trends. But his uncle isn't your average coma survivorâ€”he's a gaming enthusiast with a secret. He claims to have spent his comatose years as a guardian in a mystical realm called Gran Bahamal. Skeptical at first, Takafumi soon witnesses his uncle's magical abilities, leading them to create a YouTube channel showcasing these extraordinary powers. As they delve deeper into the world of online content creation, Takafumi must also help his uncle adapt to the technological advancements and cultural shifts he missed, including the heartbreaking outcome of the '90s console war for a devoted SEGA fan. Join this unconventional uncle-nephew duo as they traverse the challenges and triumphs of their new life together.
